message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500. I'm confident this represents a fair deal for both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $12,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $11,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. How about we meet in the middle at $11,250? This reflects my desire to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on $11,000 for the product?
